episodes.title: 5 Servings of Truth - Ramon Narayan - Friend, CEO, Dj, Youth worker and mental health advocate.
episodes.description:
Episode Content

• Friendships

• Men communicating

• Looking after ourselves 

• The people around us

• Lessons from those we have lost

• Positive advice

Thanks for listening and watching 😊

episodes.title: 5 Servings of Truth - Kyle Eggleton - 2x2 leaver, advocate, academic and Dr.
episodes.description:
Episode content.

- Positives in the health sector to support survivors.

- What other resources or assistance could be added.

- As a leaver of a high control religious group what helped with deconstruction.

- Thoughts on religion now.

- Combating the feelings of wasted years.

One final piece of advice/statement.

Thank you for listening and watching 😃

episodes.title: 5 Servings of Truth - Pearl Valor - Gloriavale leaver and advocate.
episodes.description:
Episode content 

- leaving a high control group and entering a new community.
- Gloriavale Leavers  Trust.
- New experiences.
- How anyone can help those who have left high control environments.
- What do you love about life.
- A piece of helpful advice.

Thanks for listening and watching 🙏😎

episodes.title: 5 Servings of Truth - Sam Troth - The Road to Healing Aotearoa - Advocate
episodes.description:
Episode Content

- Who is Sam.
- How to take a break from distressing content.
- Victims coming forward.
- Changes in reporting of crimes.
- How can we make a difference.
- One final piece of advice.

Thanks for listening and watching 🙏😎
